org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client

Interface ClientRequest<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the body that this request contains

    public interface ClientRequest<T>
    Represents a typed, immutable, client-side HTTP request, as executed by the WebClient. Instances of this interface are created via static builder methods: method(HttpMethod, String, Object...), GET(String, Object...), etc.
    Since:
    5.0
    Author:
    Brian Clozel, Arjen Poutsma

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ClientRequest.BodyBuilder
      Defines a builder that adds a body to the request entity.
      static interface  ClientRequest.HeadersBuilder<B extends ClientRequest.HeadersBuilder<B>>
      Defines a builder that adds headers to the request.
